div.p:
Curia capitalis burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem per balliuos tercia die
Octobris anno Domini Mmo iiijcmo lxxiiijto quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes
patent in Rotulo sectarum

Eodem die Alexander de camera electus fuit in officium prepositure pro anno sequente
et ad deseruiendum fideliter in dicto officio Juramentum prestitit corporale

Johannes de Vaus Dauid meignes Dauid symson et gilbertus de camera
electi fuerunt in officia ballivorum prestitis per eosdem solitis Juramentis

Johannes Vaus senior alexander de camera alexander andree et Duncanus de
straloch eodem die continuati fuerunt in officio sergeandorum pro anno futuro

Eodem die thomas de camera procurator domini andree seres capellani altaris beate
marie virginis in ecclesia parrochiali beati nicholai protestatus fuit coram preposito et ballivis
protribunali sedentibus pro annuo Redditu duodecim denariorum debit' annuatim dicto
altari et capellano eiusdem et a longo tempore non solut' de quadam terra
iacente ad caput vici castri inter terram quondam Roberti gillespy ex parte occientali
ex vna et terram eiusdem Roberti ex parte australi partibus ex altera et
venellam regiam ex / orientali et boreali partibus Ad quam terram personaliter accedens
nichil reperit distringibile ad dictum annuum redditum recuperandum preter terram
et lapides quos presentavit in curia coram ballivis tanquam primo die processus Testibus
Johanne lambyntoune thoma og et Duncano straloch sergeando

Item dictus thomas de camera protestatus fuit / quod huiusmodi processus non sibi preiudica
ret quoquo modo quam ad vnum annuum redditum xij d' sibi vt asserit debit' annuatim
de eadem terra et cetera

Item eodem die dominus patricius tulloch capellanus et procurator altaris beati Niniani in ecclesia
parrochiali huius burgi accedens ad barram protestatus fuit pro vno annuo redditu
vj s' et viij d' debit' dicto altari et capellano eiusdem de quadam terra quondam
Johannis colini iacente in vico viridi prout patet in actione precedenti Ad quam terram
personaliter accessit et nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos presentauit
in curia tanquam secundo die processus Testibus Andrea philpson Johanne echt
sy burgensibus huius burgi et alexandro de camera vno sergeandorum

Item eodem die actiones mote et pendentes inter gilbertum morison curatum Duncani
litstar et Johannem de torryleith penes quondam peciam terre ut supra in primo actione
Respectuantur propter debilitatem curie statu quo nunc absque preiudicio parcium vsque
ad diem veneris proximo venturo videlicet vijm diem huius mensis octobris

Eodem die Willelmus setoune adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta prosecucione plegij aduersus
Willelmum blindsel tanquam plegium pro Johanne ruthirfurd pro iniusta detencione xxvj
marcarum viii s' et x d' prout continetur in actione precedenti et dictus Willelmus blindsel quitus
per assisam de dicta calumpnia quousque per nonam sectam attachiatur
Curia balliuorum tenta quinto die Octobris anno et cetera lxxiiijto

quo die Jacobus de
Kyntor comparens coram ballivis protribunali sedentibus fatebatur se plegio alexandro trail pro
vna barella salmonum pro thoma branche vnde ballivi precipiebant et onera
bant eundem ad satisfaciendum eidem alexandro dictam barellam salmonum infra xvnam

Die sexta mensis et anni prescriptorum alexander mvche commorans apud colehil coram preposito
et ballivis fatebatur se debitorem henrico mortimar de vna barella bituminis
precii xvj s' Inde soluit iii s' per confessionem dicti henrici Residuum promisit soluere
ad festum beati martini proximo venturo in denariis uel denariatis

Eodem die quidam her arnaldus cornelison adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta detencione
xviij coronarum a Jacobo claisson secundum tenorem cuiusdam littere testimonialis sub secreto si
gillo burgi de edinburgh prout inuentum fuit per assisam / et ad satisfaciendum infra terminum iuris

Item eodem die fergusius blithnes fatebatur se debere Dauid hil vnam barellam
salmonum quam ballivi mandabant eundem ad satisfaciendum dicto Dauid priusquam recederet de
pretorio

Item eodem die copinus lawris procurator et nomine procuratorio loyk laris le portour de brugis
calumpniavit thomam culan de iniusta detencione quinque barellarum salmonum cum dimidio barella
a dicto loyk / quo negan' dictam calumpniam positum erat ad assisam per quam ma
ture auisatam deliberatum fuit quod ex eo quod dictus copinus defecit in sua probacione /
si dictus thomas Jurare vellet quod non tenetur dicto loyk in dictis salmonibus quitus fuit
Super quo purgavit se per Juramentum suum quod non tenetur dicto loik preter quam in vna barella salmonum
de qua dictus loyk eidem thome persoluere tenetur xiiij s' g' et cetera quitus de residuo et cetera

add.foreign:
Appunctuacio inter consilium et andream alanj de assedacione dimedij rethis de
de mydchingil et cetera

div.p:
The sext day of August the yer' of god M iiijc lxxiiij It is appoyntit and
accordit betuix the hail consel of the burgh of aberdene on the ta part than present
And androw alanson aldirman of the said burgh in the tyme on the tothir part
in maner' and fourme as eftir folowis that is tosay . that the said Andro
alanson sal hafe in tak and assedacione ane half net of the Raik or of
the mydchingil quhilk that erast vakis eftir the termes of the
last assedacione quhilk is made vndir the commone seil quhil the termes
of sevyn yeris be fullely complete and runnyn / til him and his assigna
is dwelland within the said burgh And gif it hapnys that he takys
ane half net of the Raik he sal hafe it free for viij yeris And
gif he takis ane half net of the mydchingil he sal hafe it for
ten yeris free but ony mail paying . becaus' that he has pait
in hand the day of the making of this write for frething of certane
dettis and taxis aucht til the king of the toune / and for the Releisching
of diuers' pur' folkis that war taxt and nocht of power topay fourty
pundis thare tax fourty pundis of the vsuale money of scotland Apon
the quhilk the said androw sal hafe made til him ane lettre of assedacion
vndir the commone seil of this toune / heratour the forsaid Androw has lent
for the outredding of this toune the said day fouretene pundis quhilkis
salbe pait til him agane of the erast commoune gudis that cumis In
and may be gottyn of this toune In witnes heirof this present write
is subscrivit with the handis of certane persons of the consel of the said burgh
And gif the said androw may be pait betuix this and martymes next tocum of his xl li' he sal
discharge him of al pointment beforewritin
I rychard of Kyntor approuiys' this writ with my awin hand
And I Androw scherar' approbo manu propria
Ego alexander blindsele approbo omnia prescripta teste manu propria
ego ghilbertus vaus approbo prescripta teste manu propria
ego Jhohannes Kyntor approbo manew propria
Ego patricius badenach subscribo et approbo manu propria et subscribo
ex parte Dauid symson de mandato suo coram testibus subscriptis
And I Dawy mathowsone apprwys be myn awyn hande

Die viia octobris anno et cetera lxxiiij coram preposito et consilio Thomas de mar constituit Johannem
Wode suum procuratorem ad prosequendum Elenam fawconar' commorans in montros de vno anulo
aureo eidem thome liberant in vadimonio per dictum Johannem precij iiijor dimediarum auri Et
dictam elenam si necesse fuerit compellend' et distringend' pro dicto annulo in forma
Juris cum ceteris clausulis procuratorij necessariis et oportunis Et promisit de Rato et cetera

Eodem die Willelmus de Kyntor comparens coram preposito et consilio obligauit se fide
media ad soluendum et satisfaciendum Willelmo hay citra aduinculam sancti petri proximo
wlgariter nuncupant lammes vnam barellam salmonum sibi debit' de terminis transactis
secundum tenorem obligacionis eiusdem Willelmi sine vlteriori dilacione

Item eodem die Johannes de torryleith constituit Ricardum de Kyntor et thomam fif
coniunctim et divisim cum potestate substituendi suos procuratores in omnibus causis motis seu monendis
ipsum tangens et specialiter ad defendendum sasinam sibi traditam de cauda cuiusdam terre iacentis
in via castri huius burgi per resignacionem Duncani litstar prout Jura volunt Promittens Ratum et
firmum habere et habiturus quicquid dicti sui procuratores aut substituti vel substitutus ab eisdem
uel eorum altero nomine suo rite duxerint seu duxerit faciend'

Actio mota inter gilbertum morison tanquam curatum Duncani litstar et Johannem de torry
leith penes caudam cuiusdam terre ut prescribitur in actione desuper facto Respectuatur per prepositum et
consilium propter meliorem informacionem habendam vsque hodie ad quindenam absque preiudicio parcium

The viii day of october patrik talyour is oblist before the aldirman and baillie and
consel todeliuer til Johne the Vaus as procuratour til Isabel scherar' in flandris
a barel of salmond eftir the our' passing of the next schippis fra the
porte and havyn of aberdene

The xvij day of october' Jonet stane in amerciament for strublance of anny stil
fundin be ane assise and the said anny quite et cetera

head.add: burgensis soluet j marca ut infrascribitur

div.p:
Vltimo die octobris anno et cetera lxxiiij Willelmus gregorij gracia prepositi et consilij Receptus
fuit in liberum burgensem tantum prestito solito Juramento pro qua libertate soluet vj s'
et viii d' de feodo suo Judicatoris curie primj anni / et de feodo suo secundi annj tantum
soluet . Ad quod officium Judicatoris huius burgi incontinente electus fuit et assump
tus per prepositum et consilium . et ad deseruiendum fideliter in dicto officio consuetum prestitit Juramentum

add.foreign: Copia littere assedacionis facta andrea alanj

div.p:
Be it made kend til all men be thir present lettres ws bailyeis consel and communite of the burgh
of Aberdene concordialy avisit with hail assent and consent the gude and the proffit of the said
communitee diligentlie considerit in that part to hafe set in tak and assedacione til our'
weil belouit conburges and nychtboure Androw alanson aldirman in that tyme ane half
net of the Raik or ane half net of the mydchingil quhilk that plesis him
erast for the quhilk the said Androw has pait thankfully the day of the ma
king of thir lettres in hande to freith the toune of certane dettis and taxis aucht
til oure soueran lorde the king fourty pundis of the vsuale payment of scot
land and for the Releisching of diuers' pur' folkis that war taxit and nocht
of power to pay And this assedacione forsaid is made til the said Androw
and til his assignais ane or maa dwelland within the burgh of aberdene /
and til entir thare In eftir that the termys of the last assedacione be
fullely Runnyn and complete And gif it sal happin him or his assignais
til entyr with ane half net of the Raik he or thai sal hafe it frely
but mail paying for the termys of acht yeris And gif he or his
assignais enteris with ane half net of the mydchingil he or thai
sal hafe it for ten yeris free but mail paying becaus' that he has
payt before hand the forsaid fourty pundis in our' gret necessite as
said is And we the forsaidis bailyeis consell' and communite of the burgh forsaid
oblis' ws and our successouris towarand and todefend til the said Androw or
til his assignais ony of the forsaidis half nettis that he or his as
signais chesis erast enduring the termys forsaid be all and sindry
our' landis gudis and possessiones had and tobe had baith within and without
the said burgh againnis all dedely but fraude or gile In witnes
heirof we hafe made the common seil of the said burgh tobe appensit
to thir our present lettres at Aberdene the viij day of the moneth of August
the yer' of our lord m iiijc lxxiiij yeris heratour we baillies consel
and communite forsaidis ar bundin and oblist to the said Androw alanson that gif it hap
nys him todecesse before the entra of him or his assignais In
and to this present assedacione eftir that the termys of the last assedacione
be fullely complete and runnyn as god forbede it do that his assignais
sal hafe entra and Ingress' to the said tak as he war bodely
liffand and present And eftir that the termys of the last assedacione be gayn the
said Androw sal bruke and Remayn with his tak of the half net of the Raik that
he had of before for his mail paying and gressom as vthiris nychtbouris dois

Curia legalis balliuorum tenta in pretorio vltimo die octobris anno et cetera lxxiiij quo die
sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent in rotulo sectarum

div.head: Nomina assise
div.p:
Ricardus de Kyntor Johannes de Knollis Johannes de mar alexander blinschel
Dauid colison adam de crafurd gilbertus vaus alexander howison Johannes Wormot
thomas de camera Dauid mathoson Willelmus malisson thomas prat andreas rede
de badfothellis edmundus louson gilbertus morison alexander scrogis et alexander nachty

Eodem die Willelmus modan conuictus fuit per assisam de iniusta perturbacione Willelmi moir
senioris in verbo et emendabit parti lese ad visum proborum

v s' Andreas branch et, v s' Willelmus necolson, per prepositum et consilium Recipiuntur in liberos burgenses et confratres
gilde huius burgi pro quinque solidis per ipsorum quemlibet delibe
ratis preposito in alba bursa prestitis solitis Juramentis

Quj suprascripti in assisam electi et Jurati dicunt quod nesciunt si quondam alexander galt auunculus
Johannes galt obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus et cetera de quadam terra iacente in le hukstar raw
burgi de abirdene inter terram andree murray iunioris ex orientali parte et terram alexandri scherar ex occidentali
parte et cetera

Item dicunt quod quondam Henricus ruthirfurd auunculus Johannis ruthirfurd obiit vltimo vestitus
et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de vna terra sine tenemento cum pertinenciis
Jacente in vico nauium ex parte occidentali eiusdem vici inter terram mathei cowpar ex parte
boreali et terram alexandri mar ex australi parte Et quod dictus Johannes est legitimus et propinquior he
res eiusdem quondam auunculi sui de dicta terra cum pertinenciis / et est legitime etatis et valet
nunc per annum iiijor marcas ad tempore pacis xl s' Et tenetur in capite de domino Rege per seruicium burgale Et nunc existit in manibus
Jonete menyes sponse quondam dicti henrici racione coniuncte infeodacionis a tempore obitus eiusdem quondam henrici qui obiit mense Junij vltimo

add.foreign: Dauid menyes senior dominus an Wrycht

div.p:
The third day of nouembre the yer' et cetera lxxiiij It is appointit and fullely ac
cordit betuix Dauid menyes eldar on the ta part and ser Androw Wrycht maistir
of the kyrk wark of aberdene on that vthir part In maner' and fourme
as eftir folowis that is tosay that the said Dauid has sawlde to the
said ser androw in the name of Sanct Nicholace thre futhir of lede
ilke futhir contenand sex score of stanys tobe deliuerit god willand
gif wynde and wethir wil serve betuix this and pasch next tocum apon
the key of Aberdene but ony excepcione cauillacione fraude or gilde
ffor the quhilkis the said maistir of wark sal pay to the said Dauid
or his deputis or factouris deliueraris of the said lede fourty sex
pundis and ten schillingis of vsuale money of scotland for the hail thre
futhiris at the said day of the deliuerence of the lede And gif it sal happyn
the said Dauid tofailye in his defaute of the deliuerence of the said lede
at day and place forsaid as god forbede / than the said Dauid sal pay
daly to the said maistir of wark xij d' eftir the principale day be
of the deliuerence of the said lede be passit And in sic like wise gif
the said maistir of wark failyeis in payment of the said Soume for the
said lede be the said day of the deliuerence or within viij daies thareftir
at the ferrest / than the said maistir of wark sal pay to the said
Dauid or his deputis deliueraris of the said lede xij d' daily
til his expensis /and nocht tobe allowit in the principale some' Of the
quhilk lede the said Dauid gravntis him content and pait of aucht
pundis in part of payment of the said principale some' And thir condiciones
lely tobe kepit athir of the partiez til vthir has gefin gude faith
before thir witnes Alexander of chavmer aldirman alexander menyes Richard
of Kyntor Dauid colison Dauid symson gilbert of chavmer patrik
badenach Edmond lowson and vthiris mony and diuers'

The said day It is statute and ordanit be the aldirman bailyes and the hail consel that
thare salbe nane ail browyn nor tappit in this burgh derrar than for
viii d' the galoune And gif ony sellis derrar and beis tayntit and
convict tharapon thai salbe e put fra brewyn for a yer' and pay
the vnlaw to the baillies as efferis And s all fawtis of before Remittit
to this day et cetera

Curia gilde burgi de Aberdene tenta per prepositum et fratres gilde quarto die mensis
nouembris anno et cetera lxxiiij .

quo die subscripti electi fuerunt in communes consilia
rios huius burgi pro anno sequente

div.head: Commune consilium
div.p:
Andreas alanson
alexander meignes
Johannes de mar'
Ricardus de Kyntor
Johannes de Knollis
Robertus culan
Dauid colison
alexander blinschel
thomas de camera
Gilbertus Vaus
thomas de culan
Willelmus voket
Edmundus lowson
Willelmus Rettre
Johannes glenmalvyn

In curia ballivorum tenta vijo die nouembris anno predicto Thomas frater
alanj smyth posuit se in voluntate ballivorum de amerciamento curie pro perturbacione
ade Walkar et emendabit eidem ad visum proborum virorum et negauit
precogitatam maliciam et infrictionem plegiorum legalium desuper Referendo se ad
assisam quare quidem assisa auisata posuit in dilacione dictam accusacionem ad melius
se auisandum super eadem

Thomas culan conuictus per assisam de iniusta perturbacione mariote clerk Relic
te quondam Johannis henrici patris sui adiudicatur in amerciamento et ipsa quita
alexander hil in amerciamento similiter pro arte et parte eiusdem perturbacionis
patricius smyth in amerciamento pro perturbacione thome de schethin et idem thomas quitus per assisam
Willelmus modan in amerciamento pro perturbacione Johannis moir prout inuentum fuit per assisam

Eodem die assisa Respectuauit calumpniam alani smyth ad accusacionem eiusdem
de iniusta lesione ade Walkar ex precogitata malicia et de infrictione
plegium legalium quousque fuit melius avisati et cetera
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio octauo die nouembris anno et cetera lxxiiij

quo die Johannes
de Dunde in duobus amerciamentis in vno videlicet pro perturbacione cuiusdam Simonis sutoris in verbo
et in alio pro percussione alexandri cristison

Item dictus Simon et alexander cristison ipsorum quilibet in amerciamento pro perturbacione dicti Johannis
Dunde verbotenus

Item dictus Johannes Dunde adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta porrectione plegij super dictum
Simonem de iniusta detencione xx s' ab ipso pro prandio et mensa sua et dictus
simon purgauit se per Juramentum de dicto debito ex deliberacione assisa

The same day Edriane Inbardson indwellar of aberdene has fundyn gilbert
the vaus burges of the said burgh borch and souertie for him / that gif the said edrian
within a yer' and a day can nocht preve the payment of xvj rynche
gudelingis of the quhilkis he was chalansit be William angely as
procuratoure til freithrik gerytson tobe awand to the said freithrik that the
said edrian sal pay the said soume of xvj rynche gudlingis to the said freith
rik or his procuratouris he failyeand topreve the payment tharof suffi
santly as forsaid is . the quhilk he was ordanit todo be the deliuerence
of the assise in all thing as is beforewritin

Item the said day androw yung murray folowit be thom symson ane of the
kingis serssaris for the concelesing of the kingis custum of quhit claith
put In Symon Jacobsonis schip and nocht schavin to the sersearis and
custummaris It was fundin be ane assise that he had schavin the
said claith til Dauid symson and Johne of mar the son' and he qwite
of all clame tharof in tyme tocum et cetera
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio ixo die nouembris anno et cetera lxxiiij

quo die
Johannes marbet in amerciamento pro iniusta porrectione plegij super Dauid blabre de
iniusta detencione partis sue xxti solidorum
Dauid blabre in amerciamento pro iniusta porrectione plegij super dictum Johannem mar

Eodem die Willelmus moir iunior constituit Ricardum de Kyntor suum procuratorem in omnibus
causis ipsum concernentibus et specialiter ad recipiendum et recuperandum debita sua quecumque
in cuiuscumque seu quorumcumque manibus existunt Et promisit de Rato cum aliis clausulis
procuratorii necessariis et oportunis coram hiis testibus Johanne stewart Willelmo
de Kyntor et alexandro scrogis cum diuersis aliis

Curia balliuorum legalis burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio xiiijto die mensis
nouembris anno et cetera lxxiiij Quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes
patent in rotulo sectarum

Eodem die Jacobus nevyson primo die vocatus ad sectam alexandri andree vnius sergeandorum
ad respondendum plegio super eundem porrecto pro iniusta detencione duorum salmonum ponderacionis
vnius petre et dimidio cum ij li' et cetera

The same day Johne Wormot has tayn to preve within yer' and day with
thom of mar that mathou cowpar dischargit him of a barel of salmond
the quhilk the said mathou clamit the said Johne tobe awand til him
and failyand of his preif within the said terme he sal pay a barel of salmond
to the said matho without langar delay

div.head: Inquisicio
div.p:
Johannes de mar andreas scherar Dauid menyes thomas fiffe Robertus blinsel
alexander howison Edmundus lowson adam de crafurd Walterus morison
Dauid mathoson Willelmus malisson Ricardus hil Jacobus craik alexander scrogis
andreas scot henricus mortimar et Robertus buchan Qui Jurati dicunt quod nesciunt
quod quondam Robertus chavmer pater gilberti chavmer obiit vltimo vestitus et saisitus et cetera
de vna terra sine tenemento cum pertinenciis Jacente in vico castri burgi de aberdene ex parte austra
li eiusdem vici inter terram Simonis craufurdie ex parte occidentali et terram alexandri rolland
ex parte orientali et cetera

Item eodem die Willelmus de Kyntor primo die vocatus ad sectam alexandri frasar ad
respondendum plegio super eundem porrecto pro iniusta detencione xl s' a dicto alexandro Non
comparuit / et ideo precipitur sergeando quod capiat districtum ab eodem et cetera et ad premuniendum
ipsum ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam ad secundum diem processus

The assise has deliuerit anent the debatis betuix alexander blinsel and fergus
blithe in this maner / first anent the wrangwise halding of a barel of sal
mond clamit be the said fergus . thai hafe fundin that the said alexander wrangit
nocht in the halding of it because . the said fergus was awand him xxiiij s' /
the quhilk barel of salmond he sal deliuer to the said fergus he payand
til him the saidis xxiiij s' Item anent vj salmondis clamit be the said fergus
thai hafe ordanit the said alexander topay for thame alsmekil as thom
blinschel and Dauy howson sal depone be thare athis that thai war worth
And of the foure barellis of salmond clamit be the said alexander tobe
awand til him be the said fergus for the tak of his watir . In alsffer as
the said fergus may preve his payment tharof made to the said alexander salbe
allowit til him /and quhare he can nocht prefe he sal content the said
alexander tharof it that is vnpait Item the forsaidis Dauy howison and thom
blinschel has deponit be thare athis before the baillies on the morne
eftir the forsaid deliuerence that is tosay the said Dauy deponit that ane of
the said salmoundis was wourth v s' and that he perofferit samekil for it /
and the said thomas deponit that ilkane of the v fisch was wourth xxti
d' the pece our'hede et cetera
